abstract: Former New York City Parks Commissioner Adrian Benepe debunks claim made by Donald Trump at Republican National Convention that his company built golf course at Ferry Point in Bronx; Benepe says Trump Organization was selected simply to operate course.
lead_paragraph: A video biography at the Republican National Convention claimed that Mr. Trump built the Trump Golf Links at Ferry Point in the Bronx. But New York City built the course.

headline.main: Ex-New York Official Rejects Trump’s Golf Course Claim: ‘It’s Simply Not True’
headline.print_headline: Ex-City Official Rejects Claim  That Trump Built Golf Course

snippet: A video biography at the Republican National Convention claimed that Mr. Trump built the Trump Golf Links at Ferry Point in the Bronx. But New York City built the course....

keywords.value: Trump Golf Links at Ferry Point
keywords.name: organizations
